Value.label: LED Indicator Control
Value.Help: Choose if you want the LED indicator to turn on when switch is on or off or disable completely.

Item.label: LED on when switch is off
LED on when switch is on

Value.label: Automatically turn channel 1 off after interval
Value.Help: Automatically turn channel 1 off after this many seconds. 0 is disabled

Value.label: Automatically turn channel 2 off after interval
Value.Help: Automatically turn channel 2 off after this many seconds. 0 is disabled
